{{book: title=Tolkien, les racines du légendaire: La Feuille de la Compagnie no.2

'''''La Feuille de la Compagnie 2: Tolkien, les racines du légendaire''''' ("The Leaf of the Fellowship 2: Tolkien and the Roots of the Legendary") is an issue of the French journal ''La Feuille de la Compagnie''. The issue includes [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Letter to Milton Waldman
column2: letter to Milton Waldman from ca. 1951]] in both French and English versions.
